Based on the data shown in the tables, which of the following best describes the relationship between fertility and education in the United States and Canada?

choices.label: The decrease in the percent of women who are more highly educated results in a larger number of children entering school.
The decrease in the percent of women who are more highly educated correlates with the decline in fertility.
The increase in the percent of women who are more highly educated correlates with the increase in fertility.
The increase in the percent of women who are more highly educated correlates with the decline in fertility.
The increase in the percent of women who are more highly educated results in a larger number of children entering school.

content.answer: The increase in the percent of women who are more highly educated correlates with the decline in fertility.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe spatial patterns presented in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data.
